page.title: 14BRUNSWICK INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: The industrial estate is located on Sandy Lane on the outskirts of Brunswick village. The estate is in the basic shape of a horse shoe. The factories in the estate move into ready made buildings, some firms share buildings e.g.Bar interiors Ltd and Fork Lift trucks. Some factories have large and complex machinery outside the buildings e.g. haulage cranes. The majority of the firms deal in light manafacturing. {McArtur Ltd}is a company that has been on the estate for ten years. The size of the site is 5000 sq. ft. This company is construction industry. { {Monfor company Ltd}has been on the estate for ten years, it supplies farming equipment.{George Blackett}is a firm in haulage and demolition service. Corona is a drinks firm, the premises are used for storage.
